nodes.text: Nevar Yalnal was a Ranat scavenger from Aralia. He spied for the people with the most credits. Nevar was an outcast, but worked on the side as a laborer for Hrchek Kal Fas.
According to a Star Wars CCG fan site, Nevar Yalnal, as well as the Imperial AT-AT commander Nevar, was named as an anagram of Decipher employee Cheryl Kallenbach's pet dog, Raven.
